Objective: Verify clicking the hero takes user to right product page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Expected Result: All the hero images should take user to the respective product page

Objective: Verify the hero images scroll behaviour
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Expected Result:
1) The hero image should slide automatically after a certain seconds
2) The hero images should be slided by using < and > button
3) The hero images should be slided by using the radio button navigator below the hero image

Objective: Verify the featured section has four items
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Expected Result: The featured section should have four items

Objective: Verify the featured section product listing takes user to product page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click the product name (ER-01)
2) Click back button
3) Click product image (ER-01)
Expected Result: 1) The User should be taken to the correct product page

Objective: Verify the featured section product listing shows Product name, Description, Price
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Expected Result:
The Product Listing section should have the below details
Product image
Product name
Product Description
Product Price
Prodcut Price without tax

Objective: Verify the brand selection section takes user to brand page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Expected Result: All the brand images should take user to the respective product page

Objective: Verify the brand selection images scroll behaviour
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Expected Result:
1) The brand logo image should slide automatically after a certain seconds
2) The brand logo images should be slided by using < and > button
3) The brand logo images should be slided by using the radio button navigator below the brand images

Objective: Verify navigating to the Homepage by clicking logo from any page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Navigate to any page
2) Click the Opencart logo
Expected Result: The user should be taken to the Home Page

Objective: Verify navigating to the Homepage by clicking home icon in breadcrumb from any page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Navigate to any page
2) Click the home icon in breadcrumb
Expected Result: The user should be taken to the Home Page

Objective: Verify the functionality of categories selection in broader category
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps: 1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar and select the show all button
Expected Result: The User should be taken to the proper Categories page for selected category for all the categories and the products should be relevant

Objective: Verify the functionality of categories selection in subcategory category
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps: 1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar and select a subcategory
Expected Result: The User should be taken to the proper Categories page for selected category for all the sub categories and the products should be relevant

Objective: Verify the subcategories shows the count of items
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar (ER-01)
2) Click a subcategory (ER-01)
Expected Result: The count of items displayed in subcategories button and count of items displayed in category button should match

Objective: Verify the HomePage Page functionality in all the supported environments
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Open the site in any supported browser
2) Repeat from Step-1 for other environments
Expected Result: The HomePage page should work in all supported environments
